get.description: Lightweight service descriptor for uptime checks and metadata.
Lightweight service descriptor for uptime checks and metadata.

Retrieve all accounts owned by the authenticated user.

- **account_type**: Optional filter (e.g., 'traditional', 'web3').
- **include_balance**: If true, returns current balance (sensitive).
- **scope**: 'personal' (default) or 'household'.

Returns a list of account summaries.

parameters.description: If false, balance will be omitted to reduce sensitivity.
parameters.name: include_balance

schema.description: If false, balance will be omitted to reduce sensitivity.
schema.title: Include Balance
Response List Accounts Api Accounts Get

get.description:
Get current account limits for the authenticated user's subscription tier.

Returns the limits for each account type, current usage, and upgrade information.

post.description:
Link a Centralized Exchange (CEX) account using API credentials.
Validates credentials by attempting a connection (or mock validation).
Encrypts API secrets before storage.

Link a Web3 wallet (chain-agnostic).
Validates the address format for the provided chain and prevents duplicate linking
of the same chain + address by the same user.
Create a manual account for offline balances or custom asset/liability tracking.

delete.description: Delete an account and cascade related data.

schema.title: Response Delete Account Api Accounts  Account Id  Delete

get.description:
Get detailed information for a specific account.

- **account_id**: UUID of the account.

Returns account details including the 10 most recent transactions.

post.description: Metadata refresh endpoint for backward compatibility.

Trigger a manual sync of transactions for non-Plaid linked accounts.

- **start_date**: Start of sync window (default: 30 days ago).
- **end_date**: End of sync window (default: today).
- **initial_sync**: If true, bypasses manual sync limits (internal use only).

Plaid-backed accounts sync automatically via webhooks and cursor jobs.
Rate limited for free tier users (unless initial_sync=True).
Returns sync statistics.

parameters.description: Start date (inclusive) for the sync window.
parameters.name: start_date

schema.description: Start date (inclusive) for the sync window.
schema.title: Start Date

parameters.description: End date (inclusive) for the sync window.
parameters.name: end_date

schema.description: End date (inclusive) for the sync window.
schema.title: End Date

parameters.description: Bypass limit for initial post-link hydration.
parameters.name: initial_sync

schema.description: Bypass limit for initial post-link hydration.
schema.title: Initial Sync

post.description:
Process a chat message from the user.

- **message**: The user's input prompt.

Checks rate limits based on user tier, retrieves RAG context (if non-free),
generates response via Gemini, logs encrypted interaction, and returns response.
Stream AI response chunks as server-sent events.

get.description:
Retrieve chat history.

Returns the 10 most recent encrypted chat logs, decrypted for display.
Free tier limited to 10 items.

Get current AI usage quota for the user.

Returns:
- **used**: Token usage in current billing-cycle period.
- **limit**: Token budget for current billing-cycle period.
- **resets_at**: Time of next reset (billing-cycle anniversary).
- **tier**: Current subscription plan.

post.description:
Create a manual transaction entry.

Restricted to Pro and Ultimate tier subscribers.

- **account_id**: UUID of the account to associate this transaction with.
- **ts**: Transaction timestamp.
- **amount**: Transaction amount (positive for income, negative for expenses).
- **currency**: Currency code (default: USD).
- **category**: Optional category.
- **merchant_name**: Optional merchant name.
- **description**: Optional description.

patch.description:
Bulk update transactions in a single DB transaction.

- **transaction_ids**: List of IDs to update.
- **updates**: Fields to update (category, description).

Restricted to user's own transactions.

schema.title: Response Bulk Update Transactions Api Transactions Bulk Patch

get.description:
Return a single transaction with raw data.

- **transaction_id**: UUID of the transaction.

patch.description:
Update transaction fields.

For manual transactions, all fields (amount, merchant_name, ts, category, description) can be updated.
For automated transactions, only category and description can be updated.
